Orange Juice Cake

Ingredients

  • 1 box yellow cake mix
  • 1 bix vanilla instant pie filling
  • 1/2 cup vegetable oil
  • 1 cup orange juice
  • 4 eggs
  • 1/2 cup sugar
  • 1 stick butter
  • 1/2 can (??) orange juice

Instructions

  1. Preheat oven to 325F
  2. Mix cake mix, pie filling, oil, 1 cup orange juice, eggs in a large mixing bowl
  3. Pour into greased and flours Bundt pan
  4. Bake 30 mins
  5. Mix sugar, butter, and 1/2 cup orange juice (??) in saucepan
  6. Cook until mixture until thick, stirring occasionally
  7. (???) Pour over cake
  8. (???) Let stand 30 mins
  9. (???) Put icing on hot cake
